title: UK mobile carrier TalkTalk hit by hackers, 4M customers may be affected
text:
UK mobile carrier TalkTalk hit by hackers, 4M customers may be affected 
Published By: DigitalTrends.com - Today 
U.K. mobile and broadband provider TalkTalk has just suffered its third security breach in 12 months, with potentially all of its four milli...
